0: AN ACT RESTRUCTURING THE INCOME BRACKETS AND RATES OF TAX IMPOSED ON TAXABLE INCOME OF INDIVIDUALS, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTIONS 24, 32, 33, 34, AND 35 OF THE 1997 NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES, AS AMENDED

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00057
FULL TITLE : AN ACT RESTRUCTURING THE INCOME BRACKETS AND RATES OF TAX IMPOSED ON TAXABLE INCOME OF INDIVIDUALS, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTIONS 24, 32, 33, 34, AND 35 OF THE 1997 NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES, AS AMENDED
ABSTRACT : Seeks to restructure the income bracket and rates of tax imposed on taxable income of individuals thereby addressing the long-running demand of the Filipino People for lower income taxes which remain unanswered by the past administrations.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TINIO, ANTONIO L., CASTRO, FRANCE L.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Maceda (013 2016-08-22)2. Nieto (017 2016-08-31)
3. Antonio (036 2016-10-12)4. Alonte (083 2017-03-15)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-05-10
      2. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-10
          -Substitute Bill to House Bills Numbered 4774, 4688, 20, 35, 39, 57, 103, 137, 183, 292, 295, 333, 362, 363, 403, 411, 466, 562, 997, 1000, 1002, 1272, 1326, 1522, 1536, 1601, 1604, 1656, 1657, 1660, 1696, 1705, 1803, 1945, 1950, 2140, 2154, 2168, 2347, 2427, 2544, 2599, 2600, 2601, 3259, 3327, 3360, 3668, 3720, 3734, 3741, 4068, 4134, 4299 and 4696 was approved with amendments.
